acceptance_of_terms_desc: By using Acwdcom, you agree to these Terms and our Privacy Policy. These Terms apply to all users of the app. We may update these Terms from time to time, and your continued use of the app constitutes acceptance of the changes.
description_of_service_desc: Acwdcom provides users with access to various coupons and promotional offers ('Coupons') that can be used on third-party store websites. The availability and redemption of these Coupons are subject to the terms set by the respective stores.
use_of_coupons_desc:
- Coupons provided in the app are for personal and non-commercial use only.
- Each Coupon is subject to the terms and conditions set by the respective store, including, but not limited to, expiration dates, limitations on use, and geographic restrictions.
- Acwdcom does not guarantee the validity or applicability of any Coupon on the store's website. It is the user's responsibility to ensure that the Coupon is valid and applicable to their purchase.
user_responsibility_desc: You agree to use the app in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for any activities or actions taken under your account.
third_party_links_desc: The app may contain links to third-party websites, including store websites. Acwdcom does not control or endorse these websites and is not responsible for their content, privacy policies, or practices.
limitation_of_liability_desc: Acwdcom is not responsible for any losses or damages resulting from the use of or inability to use the Coupons provided.
changes_to_service_desc: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue the app or any features or services provided, with or without notice.
termination_desc: We may suspend or terminate your access to the app at our sole discretion, without notice or liability, for any reason.
intellectual_property_desc: All content, trademarks, and other intellectual property on the app are owned by Acwdcom or its licensors and are protected by copyright and trademark laws.
governing_law_desc: These Terms are governed by the laws of [Your Country/State], without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
contact_us_desc:
If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
- Email: [appacwdcom@gmail.com]
